name: The Pool Room
description:
Welcome to the pool room. a simple space to play a few rounds of UK pool. couch co-op play. 

Game benefits from having no rules YOU MAKE THE RULES. want to play solo go ahead. want to play a game of killer go ahead. play by the rules YOU know and love.

UPDATED version 0.2 now includes a sandbox editor allowing you to lay the table out as you wish and create trick shots if you desire.

UPDATED version 0.1 now includes table and ball customization.
